resources.shouldUseViewModelCachingHelpText: Check to enable client side caching of category product data, when possible. This reduces the amount of data required from the server on subsequent visits to categories that a shopper has already viewed. This applies only if the list type is 'product'.
resources.shouldUseScrollableCollectionHelpText: Check to enable automatic scrolling on lists, rather than using pagination controls to move through additional pages.
resources.productsPerPageRequiredHelpText: Enter the number of products to display on a page.
resources.viewModelCacheLimitHelpText: Enter the maximum number of browsed categories to cache. This applies only if the list type is 'product'.
resources.blockSizeRequiredHelpText: Enter the number of products to load per request. The block size setting applies to product listings through category navigation only and not to search results.
resources.listTypeHelpText: Select whether the widget instance is a product listing or search results list type.
resources.shouldUseStyleBasedHelpText: Check to turn on style based listing, enabling each of the product variants to be listed separately.
resources.productListingFieldsRequiredHelpText: Enter a list of fields to be included in the response, separated by commas. The fields setting applies to product listings through category navigation only and not to search results.
